pollResultsTableDescription: Each table row corresponds to one party. Provide party name, poll result in %, and color that will be used on the charts.
electionSettingsDescription: Provide election settings such as threshold and number of seats in the parliament.
heroTitle: It's a free, open-source platform which main purpose is to gather results of election polls to the Sejm of the Republic of Poland
moreInfoHeroDesc: Learn more about us on docs page
newPollHeroDesc: Simulate seats distribution in the future Parliament
openSourceHeroDesc: Source code and data are available on GitHub
pollsHeroDesc: Browse polls results in one place
pollsExplainedDesc: We gather poll results from multiple sources and we publish them here so that everyone has an easy access. We do our best to keep our archives up to date. You can browse polls via our search feature.
quickExampleDesc: Try out feature which lets you check seats distribution in the future Parliament. Click here to use advanced settings.
